properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 6:47PM CST until February 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River at Tiptonville.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* from Saturday February 15 until Friday February 21.
* At 6 PM Saturday the stage was...31.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 38.5 feet on Tuesday February 18.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday February 15 and
continue to rise to near 38.5 feet by Tuesday February 18. The
river may fall below flood stage by Friday February 21.
* At 39.0 feet...In Tennessee, water begins to go over Tiptonville
Ferry Road, Barr Road, and the farm land east of the Tiptonville
Ferry Road.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
